heading: HB07922
0: AN ACT MANDATING THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT TO INCREASE THE UNCONDITIONAL CASH TRANSFER (UCT) PROGRAM TO P500.00 TO BENEFIT 22 MILLION POOR FILIPINOS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07922
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT TO INCREASE THE UNCONDITIONAL CASH TRANSFER (UCT) PROGRAM TO P500.00 TO BENEFIT 22 MILLION POOR FILIPINOS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Mandates the DSWD to increase the Unconditional Cash Transfer from P200 to P500 to promote poverty alleviation schemes in a successive and progressive manner.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L., Ph.D.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-16
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Del Mar (000 2018-09-04)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS ON 2018-07-30
